title: Implement Digital Operational Resilience Testing Programme
description: As a financial entity, I want to implement a digital operational resilience testing programme as outlined in Article 24, which includes executing various tests such as vulnerability assessments, open source analyses, network security assessments, and other specified tests, in accordance with the criteria set out in Article 4(2).

title: Conduct Vulnerability Assessments for CSDs and CCPs
description: As a Central Securities Depository (CSD) or Central Counterparty (CCP), I need to perform vulnerability assessments before deploying or redeploying applications, infrastructure components, and ICT services that support critical or important functions, ensuring the resilience of financial operations.

title: Risk-Based ICT Testing for Microenterprises
description: As a microenterprise, I need to perform ICT testing by combining a risk-based approach with strategic planning, considering the balance between resource scale, time allocation, and the urgency, type of risk, and criticality of information assets and services, while also considering the entity's ability to take calculated risks.
